column4: i somehow got xawtv into my sound-media folder in desktop it crashes comptuer when I click it while testing tv in card i want to just us e tv time and get rid of it
I am toying with an idea...is it possible to test a tar.gz for compatibility before unpacking?
you could use "tar tzf foo.tgz" - that'll list the files in the tarball if it's valid
only in that if tar doesn't understand the file it will fail to list them, it's not actually a test operation though
